com.xlpoolsion.server.model.levels

Class BaseLevelModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xlpoolsion.server.model.levels.BaseLevelModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleLevelModel

    public abstract class BaseLevelModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The model with the levels information

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseLevelModel(boolean[] connectedPlayers, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2[] playerSpawns)
      Constructs a Level Model with the indicated players that will be created in the indicated spawns. createBricks and createBreakableBricks are template methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseLevelModel

        public BaseLevelModel(boolean[] connectedPlayers,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2[] playerSpawns)
        Constructs a Level Model with the indicated players that will be created in the indicated spawns. createBricks and createBreakableBricks are template methods
        Parameters:
        connectedPlayers - Boolean array to indicate which players are connected
        playerSpawns - Array of player spawns. Coordinates are relative to the grid

    • Method Detail

        Creates a bomb at the player coordinates
        Parameters:
        playerId - The id of the player creating the bomb
        Returns:
        The created BombModel

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates the game by setting for removal the bodies that should be removed
        Parameters:
        delta - The size of this physics step in seconds.

      • createExplosions

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The created ExplosionModels
